title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

shared.description: Specifies whether to create service in shared directory (true / false).

x-prompt.message: Do you want to create service in 'shared' directory? (--shared)

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder.
path.x-prompt: Where to create new service, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder? (--path)

name.description: The name of the new service.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service? (--name)

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.
